entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
